# vlaplr

Vlaplr is an interface to the API of the Flemish parliament. 

## Installation

You can install the released version of vlaplr from this repo with:

``` r
require(devtools)
install_github("datamarinier/vlaplr")

```

## Usage

This is only the initial setup. The package contains one unuseful toy function which gives you the start of the week (Monday) of a certain date.
``` r
library(vlaplr)
get_start_week("2021-11-03")

#returns "2021-11-01 

```
